verbose_text: Smith RB 1, Swartzentruber GS 2, Richardson WH 1,3 1 Palmetto Health Richland, Columbia, SC, USA; 2 University of Pittsburgh Medical Center, Pittsburgh, PA, USA; 3 Palmetto Poison Center, Columbia, SC, USA Background : Intravenous injection of reformulated Opana ER (R) has recently been described to cause hemolytic anemia and thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP) in a 2012 report by the Tennessee Department of Health.
